summary.p1: Experienced Front-End Developer with a strong foundation in web technologies and a passion for creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. Proficient in a variety of front-end frameworks and libraries, more focused in React.JS, with a solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Skilled at translating design concepts into responsive and interactive web experiences.
summary.p2: Additionally, I have experience in backend development using technologies such as Node.js and Java, which enables me to create comprehensive and robust solutions.
summary.p3: Committed to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and consistently enhancing skills to deliver seamless digital solutions.
